trends: There has been one other sighting in Fairburn
There were no other sightings in Fairburn on or around January 4th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi took the dog out at about 9:30 pm and noticed what seemed to be a dancing star. there was no pattern, just dancing around the same area. there was no moon and though there is an airport nearby, it wasn't a plane. i got my camera, a kodak p712 that takes videos and tried to video it. i was puzzled, i could not figure out what it was. i looked for trailing lights to see if it was a spotlight, but did not see anything, just that ball dancing. i did not even know it had colors until i downloaded it from the camera. it looked like white light to me watching it. i shrugged, put my camera away, called the dog and went to bed. later the next morning i remembered it and download the film from the camera and saw the colored lights. i uploaded it, at slower speed, to youtube - *(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms\sg).
Summary: It looked like a dancing star, darting around in the sky
